text:
Tasmanian Development Order 1999

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following order under section 9(6) of the Tasmanian Development Act 1983 .

20 September 1999

G. S. M. GREEN

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

J. A. BACON

Minister for State Development

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Tasmanian Development Order 1999 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Principal Act
    In this order, the Tasmanian Development Act 1983 is referred to as the Principal Act.

4.
The amendment effected by this clause has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Tasmanian Development Act 1983 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 29 September 1999

This order is administered in the Department of State Development.
